name: IE-Automation-PnP-IE3400-Edge-Jinja_7101221235110
templateContent:
{% set mgmt_list = mgmt_ipaddress_input.split(' ') %}
{% set mgmt_ip = mgmt_list[0] %}
{% set mgmt_mask = mgmt_list[1] %}


##pub key for tom
username tom privilege 15 secret 9 $9$dfyzBBDAznBeM5$/XuqMen2.Ulwlbs4Vsqzhd6/aCGuN4v0jIkmTHPCKX6

ip ssh pubkey-chain
  username tom
   key-hash ssh-rsa 4E8E36C660188E67A004B4A2CFF9EDB3

##timetamps etc
clock timezone AEST 10 0
service timestamps debug datetime msec localtime
service timestamps log datetime msec localtime year

##aaa config
aaa new-model
aaa authentication login default local
aaa authorization exec default local
aaa authorization console



##enable programability
netconf-yang
restconf

vlan 10
 name CORP
 state active
vlan 20
 name MGMT
 state active
vlan 30
 name PROD
 state active
vlan 40
 name CCTV
 state active
vlan 524
 state active
 
##downstream pnp
pnp startup-vlan 524



interface vlan 20
 description MGMT SVI
 ip address {{ mgmt_ip }} {{ mgmt_mask }}
 no shut
 
interface range GigabitEthernet1/1-2
 description RING INTERFACE
 switchport mode trunk
 rep segment 1
 rep ztp

interface range GigabitEthernet1/3-9
 shutdown
 switchport mode access
 spanning-tree portfast
 sw access vlan 666
 description UNCONFIGURED ACCESS PORT


device-tracking policy IPDT_POLICY
 tracking enable

templateParams.description: Address with subnet in dotted quad format
